page.title: 16Insurance Office-Dorking NE
page.content: Friends' Provident was built 1957.It was decided to build it in Dorking because London was crowded and people preferred working in the country.There are about 1000-1200 people working in the office occupying about 50 different kinds of jobs.The office insures Life,Pensions and Health.It used to do General{Insurance }until 1974.When the office was built it was made so that if a war broke out it could be immediately changed into a hospital.There is a{Sports Hall}which was opened in 1981.There is a computer department(opened 1982)which cost Â£7,850,000 to build.It has 2 IBM computers that link with all the other offices.It is highly protected, with 24hr. security,burglar alarms, automatic calls to the fire brigade, ventilation system and a camera overlooks the department's main door.
